CustomField.formula:
IF( AND
(Injoignabilite_en_cours_TECH__c=false, Etat_Pudo__c<>"7", Etat_Pudo__c<>"8", Etat_Pudo__c<>"9",
OR(ISBLANK(Date_de_rappel_planifiee__c), Date_de_rappel_planifiee__c<=Today()),
OR( AND(RecordType.DeveloperName="DPD_BNL_Indisponibilite", Date_fin_Indispo_ChTech__c=true), AND(RecordType.DeveloperName="DPD_HUN_Indisponibilit", Date_fin_Indispo_ChTech__c=true),
RecordType.DeveloperName="DPD_BNL_Indisponibilit_PDA", RecordType.DeveloperName="DPD_HUN_Indisponibilit_PDA"
)),
true, false)
CustomField.label: Conditions Indisponibilit√©
